FDA/CDER/OND/ODEIV/DPMH 40 
Challenge Question 3 
You are treating a male patient who is concerned about the effects of a 
drug on fertility.  You review the drug labeling that is in the PLLR format.  
Where in drug labeling might you find data from human fertility studies?  
 
A. Section 6. Adverse Reactions  
B. Section 8.3. Females and Males of Reprodu
